text.name: info1
text.text: Developers: Matt Ownby (Daphne) and Jeffrey Clark (Hypseus)

text.name: info5
text.text: Daphne is a program that lets one play the original

text.name: info6
text.text: versions of many LaserDisc arcade games.

text.name: info7
text.text: Hypseus is a fork of Daphne to improve
